definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: Everest Snowman foundling, blocked septic tanks.
sentences.chinese: 聖母峯雪人的棄嬰，化糞池堵塞的兇手。

sentences.english: Hundreds of unwanted babies are abandoned on the streets of Seoul, South Korea, every year.
sentences.chinese: 在韓國首爾，每年都有幾百名棄嬰被遺棄街頭。

sentences.english: Now he is under arrest for allegedly helping abandon the child.
sentences.chinese: 但據傳他是棄嬰事件的同犯，現已將其拘留在案。

sentences.english: A new-born baby was found abandoned on the steps of a hospital yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天在醫院的臺階上發現了一個新生的棄嬰。

sentences.english: The infant had been orphaned on a desolate world near the Arah asteroid belt.
sentences.chinese: 這個孩子是阿拉小行星帶附近一個荒涼世界的棄嬰。

sentences.english: Baby abandonment is an issue that needs collaborative efforts of social security departments and judicial agencies to solve.
sentences.chinese: 棄嬰行爲需要社會保障部門和司法機關共同解決。

definition: Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
